optimized_urls.label: Optimized URLs For Product And Category Enabled
optimized_urls.comment:
Re-index Catalog Rewrites after changing this setting.
    Examples:
    Original URLs:
Category: http://ex.com/apparel/shoes/
Product:   http://ex.com/apparel/shoes/clogs.html
    Optimized URLs:
Category: http://ex.com/shoes/
Product:   http://ex.com/shoes/clogs.html

product_use_categories.label: Use Categories Path for Product URLs
product_use_categories.comment:
It duplicates the standard setting in System -> Catalog -> Seo for convenience.
Chages of this setting will influence "Product Canonical URL" setting.

enabled.label:
Add Canonical URL
Meta Header ▾
enabled.comment: We recommend to have the same allowed values for "Product per Page on Grid/List Mode" settings in System -> Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend if "Allow All Products per Page" setting is disabled.

product_canonical_url.label: Product Canonical URL
product_canonical_url.comment:
Options depends from "Use Categories Path for Product URLs" setting. Available now:
Use Longest will use the longest categories path for product URL
Use Shortest will use the shortest categories path for product URL
Use Root won't use categories path for product URL.

product_canonical_url_root.label: Product Canonical URL
product_canonical_url_root.comment: Options depends from "Use Categories Path for Product URLs" setting. Only "Use Root" option available now.

enable_canonical_tag_for_layered_navigat.label:
Canonical Tag for
    Category Layered Navigation
enable_canonical_tag_for_layered_navigat.comment:
We do not recommend to use "Current Category" value if "Allow All Products per Page" setting
(System -> Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend)
is disabled.
Please note that you can overwrite this setting for each product attribute separately using "Canonical Tag for Pages Filtered by Layered Navigation Leads to" setting (Attribute -> Frontend properties).

ignore_pages.label: Ignore Pages
ignore_pages.comment:
Canonical URL Meta Header will not be added for these pages.
    For category: 'catalog_category_view'
    For product: 'catalog_product_view'
The values for other pages you can find out using "Tools for SEO Suite extension" ->
"Show Action Name of Page".

trailing_slash.label: Trailing Slash For Canonical And Sitemap Urls
trailing_slash.comment: Note: the trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm

layered_hide_attributes.label: Hide Attribute Names
layered_hide_attributes.comment: Hide Attribute Names in Layered Navigation URLs when possible.

pager_url_format.label:
Pager URL Format
        for Categories
pager_url_format.comment:
If empty, original URL format is used:
/mobile-phones.html?p=2
Examples:
-page[page_number]    will transform URL into
/mobile-phones-page2.html
/p/[page_number]    will transform URL into
/mobile-phones/p/2.html
-[page_number]   is not recommended if you do have categories or layered navigation filters ending with "-[0-9]":
/laptop-series-3.html, /phones-60.html, etc.

enable_link_rel.label: Add Link Rel="next/prev"
enable_link_rel.comment:
Note: Next/Prev functionality will be disabled if
"Allow All Products per Page" setting
(System ->Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend)

noindex_pages.label: NOINDEX, FOLLOW Robots Meta Header For Pages Without Content

noindex_pages_user.label: NOINDEX, FOLLOW Robots Meta Header For Additional Pages
noindex_pages_user.comment:
Can be either a full action name or a request path. Wildcard allowed
Examples:
    review_product_*
    review/product/*
    rss_*
    rss/*
The values for other pages you can find out using "Tools for SEO Suite extension" ->
"Show Action Name of Page".

noindex_nofollow_pages_user.label: NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW Robots Meta Header For Additional Pages
noindex_nofollow_pages_user.comment:
Can be either a full action name or a request path. Wildcard allowed
Examples:
review_product_*
review/product/*
rss_*
rss/*

robots_editor.label: Robots.txt Editor
robots_editor.comment: Robots.txt file should be granted 777 permissions.

status_pager_num_for_title.label:
Add Pager Number to
Meta Title

status_pager_num_for_description.label:
Add Pager Number to
Meta Description

cut_title_prefix_and_suffix.label:
Remove Default Title Prefix/Suffix
for Product and Category Pages

status_dynamic_meta_title.label:
Enable Dynamic Meta Title for
Product and Category Pages

status_dynamic_meta_description.label:
Enable Dynamic Meta Description
for Product and Category Pages

status_dynamic_meta_keywords.label:
Enable Dynamic Meta Keywords
for Product and Category Pages
status_dynamic_meta_keywords.comment:
Dynamic templates use patterns from
Catalog -> SEO Suite Templates and don't work if appropate pattern is disabled.

extended_category_layered_navigation_met.label: Enable Extended Meta Title On Category Layered Navigation Pages
Enable Extended Meta Description On Category Layered Navigation Pages

template_limit.label: Number of Items for One-Time Processing during Templates Applying (Applicable to Dynamic Templates only)

product_og_enabled.label: Enable Open Graph Protocol For Products
product_og_enabled.comment: Please visit Official site for more info

enable.label: Enable Rich Snippets ▾
enable.comment:
It includes entity of a product (name, image, description, aggregate rating, offering with price, availability, webpage language).
Google Testing Tool

category_deepest.label: Use Deepest Category
category_deepest.comment: Set "Yes", if products are assifned to multiple categories and sub-categories in the same chain.

enable_dimensions.label: Add Dimensions ▾
enable_dimensions.comment:
Dimensions are of the form
'[Number] {Length unit of measure}'. E.g., '7 ft', '10'.

dimensions_unit.label: Dimensions Unit
dimensions_unit.comment:
If dimensions are digital, enter dimensionality unit
(E.g. mm, inch), in other case leave a field empty

condition_value_default.label: Default Value For Condition
condition_value_default.comment: Used if the attribute isn't found

show_action_name.label: Show Action Name of Page
show_action_name.comment: Show the "full action name" for the current page (see 'ACTION NAME IS' in source code). This value can be used for "Ignore Pages", "NOINDEX, FOLLOW" settings.
